description: More measures to contain the spread of the pandemic are announced by the island's chief minister.
title: Coronavirus: Isle of Man confirms first two cases
title_page: Coronavirus: Isle of Man confirms first two cases - BBC News
maintext: The recording of details of passengers travelling to the island would be "strengthened" to help police enforce the new laws requiring all arrivals to self-isolate for a 14-day period, Mr Quayle said.
